metadata.title: CVE-2024-47684 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:tcp: check skb is non-NULL in tcp_rto_delta_us()We have some machines running stock Ubuntu 20.04.6 which is their5.4.0-174-generickernel that are running ceph and recently hit a null ptr dereference intcp_rearm_rto(). Initially hitting it from the TLP path, but then later wealsosaw it getting hit from the RACK case as well.
